content: Hello! I need help setting up a new React project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS.
I'll help you set up a new React project with TypeScript and Tailwind CSS. Let me create the project structure for you.

Creating a new React app in /Users/user/my-project...

Installing packages. This might take a couple of minutes.
Installing react, react-dom, and react-scripts with cra-template-typescript...

Success! Created my-project at /Users/user/my-project
Great! The React TypeScript project has been created. Now let's add Tailwind CSS to the project.

input.command: cd my-project && npm install -D tailwindcss postcss autoprefixer

content: Perfect! Tailwind CSS has been installed. Now let's initialize Tailwind and create the configuration files.
